name: Half-Green Dragon Assassin
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the half-dragon has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the half-dragon scores against a {@status surprised} creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the half-dragon is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the half-dragon instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The half-dragon deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the half-dragon that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the half-dragon doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
